pyljvim is a LiveJournal LiveJournal (Russian: Живой Журнал), formerly stylised as LiVEJOURNAL, is a Russian-owned social networking service where users can keep a blog, journal, or diary. American programmer Brad Fitzpatrick started LiveJournal on April 15, 1999, as a way of keeping his high school friends updated on his activities. In January 2005, American blogging software company Six Apart purchased Danga Interactive, the company that operated LiveJournal, from Fitzpatrick. plugin for Vim Vim ( ; short for vi improved) is a free and open-source text editor. Vim provides both a terminal screen user interface as well as a graphical user interface (called gvim). . With this plugin, you can post to LiveJournal directly from Vim! :)

In fact, I am posting this entry from Vim.

You can find it here: pyljvim on Vim.org

Installation is straightforward, and the usage is simple as well.
